___location.description:
Azure GEO region: e.g. West US | East US | North Central US | South Central US | West Europe | North Europe | East Asia | Southeast Asia | etc. 
The geo region of a resource never changes after it is created.

___name.description: The name of the SignalR resource.

___tags.description: A list of key value pairs that describe the resource.

$eref.description: Settings used to provision or configure the resource.

___hostNamePrefix.description:
Prefix for the hostName of the SignalR service. Retained for future use.
The hostname will be of format: <hostNamePrefix>.service.signalr.net.

___properties.description: Settings used to provision or configure the resource

$eref.description: The billing information of the resource.(e.g. basic vs. standard)

___name.description: The name of the SKU. This is typically a letter + number code, such as A0 or P3.  Required (if sku is specified)

___capacity.description:
Optional, integer. If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not 
possible for the resource this may be omitted.

___size.description: Optional, string. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

___tier.description: Optional tier of this particular SKU. `Basic` is deprecated, use `Standard` instead for Basic tier.

___family.description: Optional, string. If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

___sku.description: The billing information of the resource.(e.g. basic vs. standard)

___family.description: Optional, string. If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

_88SignalRCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: Settings used to provision or configure the resource.

The hostname will be of format: <hostNamePrefix>.service.signalr.net.
